about.metaTitle: About Us -- Team and Story | Rammer Tech
about.metaDescription: Meet the Rammer Tech team -- passionate software developers specializing in custom solutions and SEAP/SICAP public procurement.

hero.title: Your Technology Team
hero.subtitle: We are a small, agile, and passionate team that transforms ideas into impactful software solutions.

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Rammer Tech was born from the desire to bring quality technology where it matters most -- in Romanian businesses. We started with a simple vision: to build software that actually works, that solves real problems, and that makes a difference in our clients' daily lives. From our first projects to today, we have remained true to our fundamental principle: quality is non-negotiable.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: We deliver software solutions that transform businesses and simplify complex processes.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To become the go-to partner for digitalization of SMEs in Romania.

seap.metaTitle: Public Procurement SEAP/SICAP -- Assistance & Software | Rammer Tech
seap.metaDescription: Complete public procurement services: SEAP assistance, SICAP compliance, tender monitoring, and software solutions for economic operators and contracting authorities.

hero.title: Complete Public Procurement Expertise
hero.subtitle: We navigate the complexity of SEAP and SICAP for you -- from documentation to winning tenders.

explainer.title: What is SEAP/SICAP?
explainer.seapDescription: The Electronic Public Procurement System -- Romania's national platform where public tenders take place.
explainer.sicapDescription: The Collaborative Information System for Public Procurement -- the compliance and reporting component.
explainer.whyMatters: Public procurement in Romania is worth billions of euros annually. Correctly navigating this system means immense opportunities for your business.

operatorServices.title: Services for Economic Operators
operatorServices.subtitle: Want to win tenders? We help you.

items.description: Connection with internal systems (ERP, CRM).

items.question: How much do SEAP assistance services cost?
items.answer: Costs vary depending on the complexity of the tender and requested services. Contact us for a personalized quote.

items.question: How long does it take to prepare a bid?
items.answer: Generally, preparation takes between 5 and 15 business days, depending on complexity and submission deadlines.

items.question: Can you guarantee winning the tender?
items.answer: We cannot guarantee winning, but we maximize chances through impeccable documentation, optimal pricing strategy, and full compliance.

items.question: Do you work with micro-enterprises?
items.answer: Yes, we work with companies of any size. Many micro-enterprises have access to relevant tenders in SEAP.

items.question: What platforms do you monitor besides SEAP?
items.answer: We focus on SEAP and SICAP, but can extend monitoring to TED (Tenders Electronic Daily) for European tenders.

items.question: What does SICAP compliance mean?
items.answer: SICAP requires specific reporting and documentation throughout the execution of public contracts. We ensure full compliance with legal requirements.

form.name: Full name
form.success: Thank you! We'll get back to you within 24 hours.
form.error: An error occurred. Please try again.

items.question: How long until I receive a quote?
items.answer: Usually, we get back with a quote within 2-5 business days after the initial discussion, depending on project complexity.

items.question: Do you have a minimum project size?
items.answer: We don't have a strict minimum, but our projects usually start from a few thousand euros. We discuss budget openly in the first meeting.

items.question: How does remote collaboration work?
items.answer: We use modern communication and project management tools. We have regular status meetings and transparent progress reporting.

sections.title: Data Controller Identity
sections.content: Rammer Tech SRL, headquartered in Romania, is the controller of your personal data collected through this website.

sections.title: What Data We Collect
sections.content: We collect the following categories of data: data provided through the contact form (name, email, phone, company, message), browsing data (IP address, browser type, pages visited), and technical cookies necessary for the site's operation.

sections.title: Purpose of Collection
sections.content: Data is collected for: responding to contact requests received through the form, improving the site experience through traffic analysis, and ensuring the security and proper functioning of the site.

sections.title: Legal Basis
sections.content: We process data based on your consent (contact form) and our legitimate interest (analytics, security).

sections.title: Data Retention Period
sections.content: Contact form data is retained for 2 years from the last interaction. Analytical data is anonymized and aggregated.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.content: You have the right to access, rectify, delete, port, and object to the processing of your personal data. To exercise these rights, contact us at the email address indicated in the contact section.

sections.title: Cookies
sections.content: The site uses essential cookies for operation and analytical cookies (with consent). You can manage cookie preferences from the banner displayed on your first visit.

sections.title: Data Security
sections.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, loss, or destruction.

sections.title: Policy Changes
sections.content: We reserve the right to update this policy. Any changes will be published on this page with the update date.

sections.title: Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing and using the Rammer Tech website, you accept these terms and conditions in full. If you disagree with any of the terms, please do not use the site.

sections.title: Service Description
sections.content: The site provides information about the software development and consulting services of Rammer Tech SRL. The site content is informational and does not constitute a firm commercial offer.

sections.title: Intellectual Property
sections.content: All site content (texts, images, logo, design, source code) is the property of Rammer Tech SRL and is protected by copyright law. Reproduction without written consent is prohibited.

sections.title: Limitation of Liability
sections.content: Information on the site is provided 'as is'. We do not guarantee uninterrupted availability of the site and are not responsible for any losses resulting from the use of the information presented.

sections.title: External Links
sections.content: The site may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the content or privacy policies of these sites.

sections.title: Electronic Communications
sections.content: By using the contact form, you agree to receive electronic communications from us regarding your request.

sections.title: Applicable Law
sections.content: These terms are governed by Romanian law. Any dispute will be settled by the competent courts in Romania.

sections.title: Changes
sections.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes take effect from the date of publication on the site.

cookieBanner.message: We use cookies to improve your experience on our website.
